full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 -7- Q Where do your villagers do their marketing? A. WAH ON Market. 2 How far and what direction is WAH ON Market from your village? A. About 5 or 6 li south.01 our village. Q What is the nearest neighboring village to the north of your village? A. TONG BEN VIL., is about 5 or 6 li north. Q What is the nearest village east of your village? A. There is no village nearby. Q What is the nearest village to the south? A. There is no village nearby, but WAH ON Market is 5 or 6 li south. Q What is the nearest village to the west of your village? A. There is no village nearby. Q Do you know of any other villages in the vicinity of your village than those you have mentioned? A. Yes, PING YONG Vil. 5 or 6 li to the south. Q Do you know the names of any other villages near your village? A. No. Q Your prior landed alleged brothers have mentioned several other nearby villages. A. I do not know of any other villages. Q Did you ever hear of a CHUNG BIN Village? A. Yes, it is 5 or 6 li to the north of our village. Q Is that the same as the TONG BEN Vil. which you stated a few moments ago is 5 or 6 li to the north? A. Yes. Q Can you see the PING YONG Vil. from your village, 5 or 6 li away? A. Yes, but very dimly. Q What clan occupies the PING YONG Village? A. The WONG clan. Q Are there any photographs of your father in your home in China? A. No. Q Are there any photographs of any of your brothers in your home? A. No. Q What is the color of the cat you now have in your home? A. Yellow. 2 How long have you had that same cat? A. 7 or 8 years. Q Has your mother any physical peculiarities of any kind? A. No, but she is in poor health and is sick of ten. Q Has your mother ever had smallpox? A. Yes. Q Is her face pitted? A. I misunderstood the question. I do not know whether she ever had smallpox or not, her face is not pitted. Q Have any of the emembers of your family ever had smallpox that you know of? A. I had it, but I do not know whether any of the other members of our family had it or not. Q How old were you when you had smallpox? I had them about the middle part of CR 19 (1930). Q Have any of your alleged brothers pitted faces? A. I did not notice that they do have. Q Have any of your alleged brothers had any serious illness or accidents of any kind? A. Yes, my brother GOK HAI limps a little. He had an accident when he was young. Q When, where, and what kind of an accident did he have? A. I think it was when he was 8 or 9 years old, in our home village, He had some kind of an accident, I don't know what it was, but it left him crippled. Q Didn't your mother ever tell you what crippled him? A. No. 7402/99 -7- 11/7/32
